item.title: Research
item.description: Research interest I am currently a full-time CNRS senior researcher at the Universite Paul Sabatier (Toulouse, France). I am part of the Laboratoire de Chimie et Physique Quantiques (UMR5626) within the THEO group. ERC Consolidator grant (No. 863481): Processes related to electronically excited states are central in chemistry, physics, and biology, playing a key role in ubiquitous processes such as photochemistry, catalysis, and solar cell technology. However, defining an effective method that reliably provides accurate excited-state energies remains a major challenge in theoretical chemistry.
